CustomField.description: Does the client or any of its shareholders conduct business in sanctioned countries or with sanctioned individuals? If relevant, a sanctions questionnaire is to be completed and logged with the Group Sanctions Desk.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Does the client or any of its shareholders conduct business in sanctioned countries or with sanctioned individuals? If relevant, a sanctions questionnaire is to be completed and logged with the Group Sanctions Desk.
CustomField.label: Sanctions
